item.title: Co-Chair of PERSPECTIVES 2023
item.description: The workshop Perspectives on the Evaluation of Recommender Systems goes into its third edition and will be held at RecSys 2023 in Singapore. I am happy to co-chair this workshop together with Alan Said and Eva Zangerle. The Call for Papers will soon be a available at the workshop website.

item.title: CfP: RecSys 2023 Doctoral Symposium
item.description:
The Call for Papers for the Doctoral Symposium at RecSys 2023 in Singapore is online.

This year, I have the honor co-chairing the symposium with Cataldo Musto and Xiangnan He.

We are looking forward to receiving lots of submissions. It is always a pleasure supporting young academic talent in their PhD journey.

Deadline is May 23rd, 2023.

item.title: Special Issue 'Perspectives on Recommender Systems Evaluation' @ TORS
item.description:
Together with Eva Zangerle and Alan Said, I am Guest Editor of the first special issue of the new journal ACM Transactions on Recommender Systems: ‘Perspectives on Recommender Systems Evaluation’. The Call for Papers and the submission details are already available. The deadline is 30 November 2022.

Keep in mind, that we also organize a workshop about this topic: PERSPECTIVES 2022 (which will be collocated with RecSys 2022).

item.title: Co-Chair of PERSPECTIVES 2022
item.description: The workshop Perspectives on the Evaluation of Recommender Systems is back at RecSys 2022. I am happy to co-chair this workshop together with Eva Zangerle and Alan Said. The Call for Papers and the submission details are already available at the workshop website.

item.title: Co-editing research topic on Human Issues in Recommender Systems
item.description:
I’m happy to announce that I’m co-editing with Bruce Ferwerda a so-called research topic in Frontiers in Big Data (Recommender Systems) on Human Issues in Recommender Systems.

For more information, see https://www.frontiersin.org/research-topics/23412/human-issues-in-recommender-systems.
